title: Build dist and verify CLI binary works
description: Run npm run build, verify dist/ output is correct. Test ./dist/cli.js directly. Ensure shebang line is present. Test global install via npm install -g . locally.

comments.text: Build verified: clean tsc compile, shebang present, CLI binary works (--help, --version), global install works (mx-lite 1.0.0), 214 tests passing.
